title: Mailbox settings
answer:
l Add Email Account 

Main menu > **Email**** **。 Select the type of mailbox, if no selection in the options, after entering the login screen, there will be manual and automatic settings for login.

![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601150503626001.gif)  
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601150552823001.png)  
 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=SupportImage&imagePath=/20150601150949214001.png)  

-- Manual settings:

1. Account settings interface > Enter your account number and password. 

2. Click on manual settings. 

3. Click on the POP3 , and enter into the receiving server settings interface. 

4. Click Next and enter into the outgoing server settings interface. 

5. Click Next and enter the incoming mail settings screen, select the Inbox check frequency. 

6. Click Next and enter the set up e-mail interface created for the account name and your name. 

7. Click Next and complete the login and enter the Inbox interface. 

-- Automatically (automatic settings need to preset the type of mobile phone email parameters):

1. account settings > enter your account number and password. 

2. click Next. 

3. click Next and enter the incoming mail settings screen to select the Inbox check frequency. 

4. click Next and enter the set up e-mail interface to create for the account name and your name. 

5. click Next and complete the login and enter the Inbox interface. 

Those are not preset Email Account settings for the logon process, users can log on to your e-mail service provider's Website to check. 

l Send e-mail

The Inbox interface, press menu key > **Write message****  **Enter the email interface, edit the **recipient** and the **subject** and the **content** , and then click **send mail** .   

l View/delete email

The Inbox interface, click on a message, you can view the message; click on menu> Delete , you could delete the message. 

The Inbox interface, to the left / Slide right to a message, you can delete the message. 

l Delete Email Account

Enter **settings** > **All settings**** **> **Account**** **,click the account that you want to delete, and press the menu key and select delete account.
